data.title: PearAI - The AI Code Editor For Your Next Project
data.description: PearAI is an open source AI code editor with powerful features like AI chat, PearAI Creator, and AI debugging to help you make what excites.
data.content:
PearAI - The AI Code Editor For Your Next Project
===============

[PearAI](https://trypear.ai/)

*   Resources
[Pricing](https://trypear.ai/pricing)[Documentation](https://trypear.ai/docs)[GitHub](https://github.com/trypear/pearai-master)

[Sign in](https://trypear.ai/signin)

[Sign up](https://trypear.ai/signup)

Y

[BACKED BY Y COMBINATOR](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/pearai)

PearAI: The  
AI Code Editor  
For Your Next Project
====================================================

Bring your ideas to life with the best AI tools integrated into a single code editor. Built to supercharge your project development all the way from inception to running at scale. Always open source.

[Download For Free](https://trypear.ai/pricing)

Code with[Roo Code / Cline](https://github.com/RooVetGit/Roo-Code/)\*

Predict with[Supermaven](https://supermaven.com/)\*

Remember with[MemO](https://mem0.ai/)\*

Search with[Perplexity](https://www.perplexity.ai/)\*

Chat & edit with[Continue](https://www.continue.dev/)\*

V1.8

Now With Coding AgentsStart Building Today!

V1

Out Now!Start Building Today

PearAI Inventory natively integrates the best AI tools  
into a single, powerful editor.
========================================================================================

Code with  
Roo Code / Cline\*
==============================

Chat & edit with  
Continue\*
=============================

Search with  
Perplexity\*
==========================

Remember with  
Mem0\*
======================

Predict with  
Supermaven\*
===========================

The AI space changes fast— PearAI Inventory curates the best AI tools on the market, and integrates them into a powerful editor.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Code with Roo Code / Cline

Roo Cline / Cline is the leading AI Coding Agent on the market. It has access to your development environment (with your permission) for a feedback loop to add features, fix bugs, and more.

Chat & edit with Continue

Continue is the leading open-source AI code assistant extension. PearAI Chat is built upon the foundation of Continue, with changes and a unified user experience.

Search with Perplexity

Perplexity is the leading AI search engine. Integrated within PearAI Search, you can seamlessly add web content, like up-to-date documentation, which vanilla LLMs often lack, directly into your requests.

Remember with Mem0

Mem0 is a self-improving memory layer for AI applications. It is integrated into PearAI to make coding with AI an enhanced, personalized experience.

Predict with Supermaven

Supermaven is currently the fastest code autocomplete tool available. Supermaven comes independently pre-packaged and recommended within PearAI.

Always Get The Best,  
With A Single Subscription
-------------------------------------------------

The best AI model for coding changes by the week, only known to insiders managing multiple subscriptions. PearAI Router automatically connects you to the highest-performing AI models for coding across all tools. Simply select 'PearAI Model' to get the best on market with a single subscription.

1PearAI Model

2Claude 3.5 Sonnet

3GPT-4o

4Meta Llama 3.1 405b

LLM Benchmark Scores\*

Demos

### Code automatically with PearAI Agent.

PearAI Agent (powered by Roo Code / Cline\*) can code and fix bugs for you!

### Make specific in-line changes and ask questions with PearAI Chat

Ask questions or generate code with the context of your @codebase for more accurate results with PearAI Chat - an AI chat assistant, powered by Continue.

### No more tedious changes with PearAI Chat

Inline code changes in your files with diffs. Here, PearAI Chat (powered by Continue\*) adds print statements to help with debugging.

### Research anything with PearAI Search

PearAI Search (Powered by Perplexity\*) uses web data to provide you up-to-date info, going beyond traditional AI's knowledge cutoff limitations.

Open source is transparency.
----------------------------

See every line on our public repos.

We never store your code.

Zero Data Retention policy with Anthropic.

Self-host server for enterprise.

Makers love PearAI... almost as much as PearAI loves Makers!
============================================================

If you've ever copy-pasted code into ChatGPT or Claude, download PearAI right now. Just a week ago I told an engineer on the Meta DevX team to check out Pear and see how far behind Meta was. I worked in mostly Hack (PHP), Python, and Javascript at Meta. My current startup requires almost all Swift iOS. PearAI has brought me from complete noob to at least Senior Engineer productivity in Swift iOS in less than a month. Finally, because I use the various LLMs mostly for coding I've canceled my Copilot, Claude, and ChatGPT subscriptions since switching, saving $30+/month.

Connor Clancy

Founder of Taste, prev 5 years @ Meta

PearAI has been a great help with my side projects and learning new programming languages. What sets it apart from standard AI chat tools is its ability to understand my codebase and file context, making the development process more streamlined. It's a useful tool for developers who want contextual AI assistance while coding. I wish my company adopted an AI code editor like this.

Jackson Z

Big Tech Software Engineer, Prev. Tesla AI

Try PearAI for free.

Built on top of VSCode for a seamless transition.

[Download](https://trypear.ai/pricing)[Interested in contributing ?](https://trypear.ai/docs/contributors)

\* For more information about how integrations are built into PearAI, see [here](https://trypear.ai/disclaimer).
